"Either way their ignoring us, and I find it insulting" he adds while
setting up a tripod looking instrument. After he sets it up he pulls a pink
cube from his chest and puts it into a slot. "Before we can move our ship
we'll need to find and energy source." Then he starts typing in coordinates.

OOC: Is it all right if we use energon cubes? as I dont know the usual ruel
currency.
